oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: NBC War Bond Parade - 1944-02-05 (excerpt)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Excerpt of the February 5, 1944 broadcast of NBC War Bond Parade. This Grand Ole Opry segment features performances by Roy Acuff and his Smoky Mountain Boys, and the Duke Of Paducah (also introduced as Whitey Ford).
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Roy Acuff; Smoky Mountain Boys; Duke Of Paducah
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Announcer introduces the Grand Ole Opry segment -- The Duke Of Paducah introduces Roy Acuff and his Smoky Mountain Boys and Girls -- Wait For The Light To Shine (Roy Acuff and his Smoky Mountain Boys) -- War Bond P.S.A. (Duke Of Paducah) -- Comedy routine (Duke Of Paducah) -- Announcer introduces Barry Wood
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: National Broadcasting Company; NBC War Bond Parade (Radio program); WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); Grand ole opry (Radio program); Duke of Paducah, 1901-1986; Acuff, Roy; Smoky Mountain Boys; Wood, Barry, 1909-1970
